oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ENVRI - Integration, harmonisation and publication software components - version 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Candela, Leonardo
Coro, Gianpaolo
Italiano, Angela
Mangiacrapa, Francesco
Pagano, Pasquale
Sinibaldi, Fabio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental Research Infrastructures
ENVRI Project
Software components, services and subsystems
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/H.3.7 Digital Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ENVRI Integration, Harmonisation and Publication software comprises a number of components, services and subsystems offering facilities enabling the integration and harmonization of data. The actual deliverable is thus the software realising such facilities. This document briefly describes the software components realising version 2 of these facilities and offers a series of links to the software itself and its accompanying documentation
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Common Operations of Environmental Research Infrastructures. Deliverable D4.5, 2014.
